# .NET Runtime and SDK

> The .NET runtime, SDK, and cross-platform development fundamentals. Covers installation, deployment (self-contained, framework-dependent, native AOT), containers, diagnostics, testing, and CLI tools. This is the core platform documentation for modern .NET development.

- [Build apps with .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/apps.md): .NET can be used for building many kinds of apps.
- [.NET distribution packaging](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/distribution-packaging.md): Learn how to package, name, and version .NET for distribution.
- [Get started with .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/get-started.md): Create a Hello World .NET app.
- [Introduction to .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/introduction.md): Learn about .NET. .NET is a free, open-source development platform for building many kinds of apps.
- [.NET releases, patches, and support](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/releases-and-support.md): Learn about releases, patches, and support for .NET.
- [.NET Runtime Identifier (RID) catalog](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/rid-catalog.md): Learn about the runtime identifier (RID) and how RIDs are used in .NET.
- [.NET SDK overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/sdk.md): Learn about the .NET SDK (formerly known as the .NET Core SDK), which is a set of libraries and tools used to create .NET projects.

## Subtopics

- [Additional tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/additional-tools/llms.txt): 11 topics; Additional tools documentation and reference.
- [Breaking Changes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/llms.txt): 16 topics, 537 in tree; Breaking changes and API differences between .NET versions.
- [Containers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/containers/llms.txt): 3 topics; Build container images with built-in .NET SDK support.
- [Dependency Loading Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/dependency-loading/llms.txt): 7 topics; Dependency Loading Docs documentation and reference.
- [Deployment](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/llms.txt): 6 topics, 155 in tree; Publish apps: single-file, ReadyToRun, Native AOT, and cross-platform.
- [Diagnostics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/diagnostics/llms.txt): 68 topics; Logging, tracing, metrics, and diagnostic tools for troubleshooting.
- [Docker Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/docker/llms.txt): 3 topics; Docker Docs documentation and reference.
- [Enrichment Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/enrichment/llms.txt): 5 topics; Enrichment Docs documentation and reference.
- [Microsoft.Extensions Libraries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/llms.txt): 63 topics; DI, configuration, logging, caching, and HTTP clients.
- [Install Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/llms.txt): 20 topics; Install Docs documentation and reference.
- [Native Interop Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/native-interop/llms.txt): 1 topics; Native Interop Docs documentation and reference.
- [Porting from .NET Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/porting/llms.txt): 20 topics; Migrate from .NET Framework to modern .NET with Upgrade Assistant.
- [Project SDK Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/project-sdk/llms.txt): 3 topics; Project SDK Docs documentation and reference.
- [Introduction to resilient app development](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/resilience/llms.txt): 2 topics; Introduction to resilient app development documentation and reference.
- [Resources Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/resources/llms.txt): 1 topics; Resources Docs documentation and reference.
- [Runtime Configuration](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/runtime-config/llms.txt): 8 topics; Configure runtime via runtimeconfig.json and environment variables.
- [Runtime Discovery Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/runtime-discovery/llms.txt): 1 topics; Runtime Discovery Docs documentation and reference.
- [SDK Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/sdk/llms.txt): 2 topics; SDK Docs documentation and reference.
- [Testing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/testing/llms.txt): 54 topics, 120 in tree; Unit, integration, and load testing with MSTest, xUnit, and NUnit.
- [.NET CLI Tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/tools/llms.txt): 91 topics; CLI commands: `dotnet new`, `build`, `run`, `test`, and `publish`.
- [.NET Tutorials](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/tutorials/llms.txt): 19 topics; .NET Tutorials documentation and reference.
- [.NET unmanaged API reference](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/unmanaged-api/llms.txt): 1 topics, 941 in tree; .NET unmanaged API reference documentation and reference.
- [.NET Versioning](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/versions/llms.txt): 2 topics; Version numbers, LTS/STS releases, and SDK version pinning.
- [Whats New Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/llms.txt): 8 topics, 20 in tree; Whats New Docs documentation and reference.
